items.content_html: "DocuComp is a lightweight and user-friendly tool designed to streamline the management of technical documentation and compliance tasks for developers. items.content_html: **ToDo Application** A lightweight ToDo application built with Node.js. This app allows users to create, read, update, and delete tasks, ensuring efficient task management. Featuring a simple interface and real-time updates, it uses MongoDB for persistent data storage. Perfect for improving productivity and keeping track of daily tasks.
items.title: thomas7272/ToDoApplication: **ToDo Application**  A lightweight ToDo application built with Node.js. This app allows users to create, read, update, and delete tasks, ensuring efficient task management. Featuring a simple interface and real-time updates, it uses MongoDB for persistent data storage. Perfect for improving productivity and keeping track of daily tasks.
